TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Buner, title = Buner, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buner} }

S.FORM: Buner Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Buner a niyaro', 1,710 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,775 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 24% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 76% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,642 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 21%, Truku 1%, Bunun 1%. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.

Boner Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Boner a niyaro', 1,710 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,775 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 24% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 76% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,642 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 21%, Troko 1%, Bonon 1%. Ira ko kofa i niyaro'.
